metadata.description: Physical descriptions for Gold antagonist characters from the Red Rising series for DALL-E image generation
notes: All Golds are genetically engineered to be tall (typically 6'6" to 7'+) with golden hair and gold/amber eyes
Peerless Scarred have ritual facial scars earned through Institute combat
Descriptions compiled from book series: Iron Gold, Dark Age, Light Bringer
DALL-E prompt rules: single person only, no text, no piercings, consistent art style

characters.name: Lysander au Lune

physicalDescription.height: Tall, lean athletic build typical of Golds
physicalDescription.build: Lean, athletic, trained in razorcraft and warfare
physicalDescription.skinTone: Fair, pale gold-tinged skin typical of Golds
physicalDescription.eyeColor: Pale gold eyes, described as calculating and intelligent
physicalDescription.facialFeatures: Classically handsome features, aquiline nose, resembles his grandmother Octavia
physicalDescription.scars: Peerless Scarred mark on cheekbone (earned later in series)
physicalDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Projects calm philosophical demeanor, calculating intelligence behind his eyes, imperial bearing as heir to the Lune dynasty
physicalDescription.age: Early to mid twenties in later books

appearance.armorStyle: White and gold armor bearing the crescent moon sigil of House Lune
appearance.clothing: Imperial white and gold robes when not in armor
appearance.weapons: Razor (curved blade), trained in the Willow Way sword style

characters.prompt: Single portrait of a young adult Gold man in his early twenties, lean athletic warrior build, golden hair well-groomed aristocratic style, pale gold intelligent calculating eyes, classically handsome aquiline features, scar on cheekbone marking him Peerless Scarred, wearing ornate white and gold armor with crescent moon sigil, imperial heir bearing, philosophical but dangerous expression, Red Rising sci-fi fantasy style, dramatic lighting, dark atmospheric background, digital art portrait, single person only, no text, no piercings

characters.name: Atalantia au Grimmus

physicalDescription.build: Athletic warrior build, smallest of the three Grimmus sisters but still formidable
physicalDescription.hairColor: Dark hair (unlike typical Golds - the Grimmus sisters are noted for darker coloring)
physicalDescription.hairStyle: Often styled in elaborate fashion befitting her station
physicalDescription.skinTone: Dark-skinned (the Grimmus family has darker complexion than typical Golds)
physicalDescription.eyeColor: Dark eyes, described as predatory and calculating
physicalDescription.facialFeatures: Beautiful but cruel features, seductive and dangerous, sharp aristocratic bone structure
physicalDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Known for her manipulative nature, uses sexuality as a weapon, projects both allure and menace
physicalDescription.age: Middle-aged, mature woman in her prime

appearance.armorStyle: Black and gold armor, elaborate and regal
appearance.clothing: Often in elegant gowns that still allow for combat, dark colors
appearance.weapons: Razor, master of political manipulation and military strategy

characters.name: Ajax au Grimmus

physicalDescription.height: Extremely tall, massive even for a Gold (over 7 feet)
physicalDescription.build: Massive muscular build, inherited his mother Aja's formidable physique, one of the largest warriors alive
physicalDescription.facialFeatures: Handsome but brutal features, strong jaw, intimidating presence
physicalDescription.scars: Peerless Scarred mark, possibly additional battle scars
physicalDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Known as one of the greatest warriors of his generation, arrogant bearing, carries himself with absolute confidence in his martial prowess

appearance.armorStyle: Heavy black and gold pulseArmor, storm motifs
appearance.clothing: Military attire when not in armor
appearance.weapons: Razor, renowned for brutal efficiency in combat

characters.name: Atlas au Raa

physicalDescription.build: Lean, powerful, built for endurance and psychological warfare rather than brute strength
physicalDescription.hairColor: Dark hair (Raa family tends toward darker coloring)
physicalDescription.skinTone: Tanned olive skin from Rim worlds
physicalDescription.eyeColor: Pale unsettling eyes, described as seeing through people
physicalDescription.facialFeatures: Gaunt, severe features, appears older than his years due to harsh experiences, hollow cheeks
physicalDescription.scars: Peerless Scarred mark, weathered face showing signs of torture survival
physicalDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Master of psychological warfare and torture, unsettling calm demeanor, moves with predatory stillness, eyes that seem to pierce the soul

appearance.armorStyle: Pale or bone-white armor, utilitarian and menacing
appearance.clothing: Simple, severe clothing reflecting his ascetic nature
appearance.weapons: Razor, but primarily uses psychological manipulation as his weapon
